page.title: 08MY HOUSE
page.content: MY HOUSE. I LIVE IN BRUTHWAITE GREN ON THE ELMS FARM ESTATE. THERE ARE 33 HOUSES AROUND THE GREEN.APPROXIMATELY 800M AWAY IS A PARADE OF SHOPS INCLUDING A SUPERMARKET,HARDWARE,GREENGROCERS.NEWS AGENT WITH POST OFFICE,PHARMACY,RESTAURANT WITH A TAKE AWAY COUNTER AND A PUBLIC HOUSE. MY HOUSE IS 9 YEARS OLD. IT IS BUILT OF BRICK IN A TERRACE. THE GARAGE IS IN A SMALL CAR PARK AT THE END OF THE ROW.WE HAVE THREE BEDROOMS,TWO TOILETS,A BATHROOM, DINING ROOM, LIVING ROOM , KITCHEN AND SOME BUILT-IN STORE CUPBOARDS.DOWNSTAIRS THE FLOOR IS CONCRETE AND UPSTAIRS ARE WOODEN FLOORBOARDS.THE HOUSE IS CENTRALLY HEATED WITH GAS AND THE LOFT IS INSULATED.WE HAVE SMALL GARDENS FRONT AND BACK.
